_sText:
Somepeople say that "ze_lastcity_escape_final_2013 is very hard".


So I had to change it easier and greater.



At last,The map is back, bigger and better than ever!

=====Modifications====


*Player can  easily see zombies.


*Added a rope to rapeling.


*Deleted some bugs.


*Deleted Stryker.


*Some Buildings were deleted.


*Added many trees.


*Added a factory(Like SUPER 8)


*Added new way to take the train.






==========================================================
And someone said that " There is a improper credit."


So I deleted it.
